name: Commander
description: Commanders are natural-born leaders and skilled tacticians. They represent the heart and soul of a fireteam, and lead their allies to victory against all odds.

secondaryAbility.name: Battle Tactis
secondaryAbility.description: As a use action, choose one close or near mecha. They can immediately take a single move or attack action that does not count towards their total actions, then your turn resumes.

name: Engineer
description: Engineers are top-notch mechanics and mecha medics. They keep their fireteam up and fighting at peak efficiency.

secondaryAbility.name: Quick Fix
secondaryAbility.description: As a use action, reduce your AP by 1 to restore 2 HP to a close mecha.

name: Maverick
description: Mavericks are ace pilots with unmatched skill and hard-to-shake troublemaking streaks. They excel in combat, where their reckless nature can be a boon to their fireteam.

secondaryAbility.name: Reckless Attack
secondaryAbility.description: When you make a successful attack, you can choose to reduce your AP by 2 to roll one additional damage die.

name: Quipster
description: At first glance, the quipster’s nonchalant demeanor might mark them as the weak link of a fireteam – but their jovial nature belies a deep, heartfelt magnitude that can boost the morale of their fireteam and ensure victory.

secondaryAbility.name: Inspiring Speech
secondaryAbility.description: As a use action, choose a close or near mecha. They can choose to gain advantage on a single test made before the start of your next turn.
